text: PTF may refer to: ;Science * Palomar Transient Factory, an astronomical survey program * Pedotransfer function, a concept used in soil science * Phase transfer function, used for the optics of an imaging system ;Computing * Program temporary fix, an IBM locution to designate bug fixes * Ptf (file format), PlayStation Theme File, a file extension for the PlayStationPortable systems ;Other *Peter Tatchell Foundation, a British human rights organization * Police Task Force, former name of the Police Tactical Unit of the Singapore Police Force * Präzisionsteilefertigung Steffen Pfüller, a producer of high- tech precision parts and assemblies
title: PTF
